DOC.brief_summary: This study is not being conducted in the United States. Vildagliptin is an oral antidiabetic agent. This 12-week clinical study is to evaluate the effect of vildagliptin 50mg qd, 50mg bid or 100mg qd compared to placebo in patients with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Compare the Effect of Vildagliptin Compared to Placebo in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of type 2 diabetes Patients who have been placed on dietary therapy/exercise therapy without achievement of glycemic control Outpatients Type 1 diabetes, diabetes that is a result of pancreatic injury, or secondary forms of diabetes Significant cardiovascular disease Significant diabetic complications Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
